column4: Does anyone here have experience with this perl script for many archives in the same folder? http://www.ubuntugeek.com/unp-unpack-almost-everything-with-one-command.html
Why do you want that? Isn't right clicking in File manager easier?
Not in this case. I have hundreds of GB's that need to be unarchived and then I want the archives themself removed.
Ohh.. i see... well sorry on that point. Have not tested that
